e20-CO227-TourMate.title: TourMate
e20-CO227-TourMate.description: This tour guide web app helps tourists plan trips efficiently with personalized routes, hotel recommendations, and scheduling based on preferences. Built with Spring Boot and React, it integrates maps and uses JWT for secure user authentication.

e20-co227-ACES-fund-and-inventory-manage.title: ACES fund and inventory management system
e20-co227-ACES-fund-and-inventory-manage.description: Our system is designed to streamline fund and inventory management for aces, making it easier for students and staff to request resources and for administrators to efficiently manage approvals.

e20-co227-Cardiac-Patient-Data-Managemen.title: Cardiac Patient Data Management System
e20-co227-Cardiac-Patient-Data-Managemen.description: CardioGuard is a cardiac patient management system with machine learning, providing doctors and patients an overview of medical states. Doctors and administrators can access patient data for easier care, while patients can view some of their information from their initial admission into the medical facility.

e20-co227-Computer-Engineering-Portal.title: Computer Engineering Portal
e20-co227-Computer-Engineering-Portal.description: Internal and Public web service provider of the Department of Computer Engineering

e20-co227-Erasmus-plus-Project-Web-and-M.title: Erasmus plus Project Web and MIS
e20-co227-Erasmus-plus-Project-Web-and-M.description: A comprehensive software solution designed to support the management and coordination of Erasmus+ projects.

e20-co227-Food-Buddy.title: Food Buddy
e20-co227-Food-Buddy.description: Food Buddy is a solution for the food wastage of restaurants. We provide a platform, where the restaurants can display their unsold food items with attractive discounts and users can see those advertisements from nearby restaurants.

e20-co227-MLink-A-Pharmacy-Linking-Platf.title: MLink A Pharmacy Linking Platform
e20-co227-MLink-A-Pharmacy-Linking-Platf.description: MLink is an innovative pharmacy-linking platform designed to bridge the gap between access to medicine and equitable distribution across the country. With MLink, customers can seamlessly connect with a network of pharmacies, ensuring timely access to medications while upholding essential regulatory standards and verifications.

e20-co227-MONA-Dashboard.title: MONA Dashboard
e20-co227-MONA-Dashboard.description: Our project involves creating an advanced real-time monitoring dashboard for production environments. This dashboard enhances efficiency and reliability with critical insights and timely alerts. Designed for user-friendliness, it ensures operators and managers can easily access and interpret the data needed for optimal production performance.

e20-co227-Mentormate.title: Mentormate
e20-co227-Mentormate.description: Personalized AI Tutor for A/L Students.

e20-co227-Postgraduate-Student-Managemen.title: Postgraduate Student Management System
e20-co227-Postgraduate-Student-Managemen.description: The Post Graduate Students management system is an effort to enhance the administrative efficiency and academic tracking within the Department of Computer Engineering at University of Peradeniya.

e20-co227-e-Conductor.title: e Conductor
e20-co227-e-Conductor.description: e-Conductor is an online bus ticketing platform for passengers, bus owners, and transport authorities. It includes a mobile app for ticket booking, schedules, and real-time updates, plus an admin web portal for bus tracking, schedule, and revenue management. e-Conductor streamlines operations, improving convenience and efficiency.
